description: The file defines an interface `ILocalStore` within the `WPEFramework::Plugin` namespace. The interface specifies methods for managing a local data store, including opening the store, creating tables, setting entry limits, retrieving entry counts and entries, removing entries, and adding entries. It also defines a shared pointer type for the interface.

classes.name: ILocalStore
classes.description: Interface for a local key-value store with operations to manage tables and entries

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens the local store at the specified path

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table in the local store

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries for a specific table

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the number of entries in a table within a given range

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Retrieves a list of entries from a table starting at a specified index

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries from a table within a specified range

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a specified table
